title: A Master Yi Rework?
body:
Keep current Stats.


Passive: Wuju Style
Against Enemies with More attack damage than him, deal 6% Bonus damage as TD. (Accounts for Flat Damage only, so %MAX HP damage does not increase)
For every 60 AD, Crits deal 20/30/40/50 more Damage and avoids 5/6/7/8 Armor.


Q: Alpha Strike 100/115/130/145/160MP 19/18.5/18/17.5/17 seconds cooldown.
Channels for .4 seconds before dashing towards a direction 550/625/700/775/850 distance max while being untargetable during the dash.
Dealing damage to all enemies hit and upon finishing the distances, teleports behind the last enemy hit, preferably a champion and applies
double strike (If Learnt).
If no target hit he will simply appear at the end of the dash. However the cooldown will be 3 seconds longer.
Deals (At levels 1/6/11/16) 1/2/3/4%MAX HP + 25/40/55/70/85 + (At levels 1/6/11/16) 50/60/70/80%AD 
TO non-champions deal 65/105/155/215/285 + (At Levels 1/6/11/16) 40/60/80/100% bonus Physical Damage.
Critical Strikes deal (At levels 1/6/11/16) 2/3/4/5% MAX HP bonus instead of BOnus Flat Damage.

Hitting a target with Alpha Strike reduces cooldown by 1 second.
Killing a target with Alpha Strike reduces cooldown by 1.5 second and refunds 3 mana.
Auto attacks reduces cooldown by 1 second
Killing a champion  reduces cooldown by 70% and refunds  (At levels 1/6/11/16) 40/55/70/85 mana.
Killing multiple champions causes cooldown and mana to be completely refunded 

Note that the Double strike applied is part of Alpha Strike.


W: Meditate 130/125/120/115/110 MANA 41/36/32/29/27 seconds.
Passive: Inner Peace 
After Casting a spell, for 5 seconds healing from other players become 50/75/100/125/150% stronger on Yi.
Active: Begins Channeling to recover 80/110/140/170/200 +140%AP +6/8/10/12/14% MAX HP per second for 5 seconds.
HOWEVER, being attacked while meditating reduces the heal effect by 50%.
Also recovers 50% of the damage taken within 1.5/1.75/2/2.5/3 seconds before cast.
While Meditating, Cooldown on Alpha Strike and Double Strike go down 2 times faster, reducing 2 seconds cooldown per second.
Being attacked while meditating reduces meditate cooldown by 1 second.

E: Double Strike 120 Mana 24/23.5/23/22.5/22 seconds. 4.5 second cooldown after being applied by Alpha Strike.
The next attack becomes two attacks and gain 75 range.
Dealing a total of 130/135/140/145/150%AD +10/20/30/40/50Physical Damage.
OR: 65/67.5/70/72.5/75%AD +5/10/15/20/25AD per hit.
Killing an enemy refunds 40 mana cost and 20% cooldown.
If an enemy is killed on the first strike, refunds 80 mana and reduces cooldown by 50%.

R: Highlander No COst 110/85/60 second.
Passive: Every 13 seconds, attacks against a champion triggers this for 1/1.5/2 second
Passive: Killing a champion extends the duration by 4/5/6 seconds.
Passive: Killing a champion while highlander is active refunds the cooldown of  Alpha Strike and Double Strike, if Double strike is not on Cooldown, 
next attack becomes Double Strike.
Active: Gains 25/40/55 AD +25/45/65% Atk Speed +15/25/35% Movement Speed for 7/9/11 seconds. UNable to be slowed and gains 200/350/500 rang  vision.
